name: Shopify
comparison_text: Shopify is great for quick stores but traps you in their ecosystem. Ledger1CMS offers true headless commerce freedom, letting you build custom storefronts without transaction fee penalties.

name: Wix
comparison_text: Wix builds sites you can never export. Ledger1CMS generates clean, exportable Next.js code that you own 100%, hosting it wherever you want.

name: Squarespace
comparison_text: Squarespace looks good until you need custom logic. Ledger1CMS combines beautiful design with infinite backend scalability and open API extensibility.

name: Joomla!
comparison_text: Joomla lives in the PHP past. Ledger1CMS brings you to the modern edge of TypeScript, Server Components, and AI automation.

name: Drupal
comparison_text: Drupal requires a dedicated dev team to maintain. Ledger1CMS offers the same enterprise-grade permissions and workflows but is managed by AI agents.

name: Webflow
comparison_text: Webflow's CMS is rigidly tied to its visual builder. Ledger1CMS gives you a visual editor for marketers but a fully decoupled, unlimited backend for developers.

name: Adobe (AEM)
comparison_text: AEM costs millions to license and implement. Ledger1CMS delivers superior Digital Experience capabilities at a fraction of the cost and implementation time.

name: Tilda
comparison_text: Tilda makes pretty blocks. Ledger1CMS makes smart blocks that adapt to user behavior using real-time predictive AI.

name: Duda
comparison_text: Duda is good for small sites. Ledger1CMS allows agencies to deploy complex web apps and portals across thousands of clients instantly.

name: HubSpot CMS Hub
comparison_text: HubSpot forces you to learn HubL. Ledger1CMS uses standard React and TypeScript, so your developers are instantly productive.

name: Sitecore
comparison_text: Sitecore is the dinosaur of personalization. Ledger1CMS uses lightweight AI at the edge to personalize content without slowing down page loads.

name: BigCommerce
comparison_text: BigCommerce has limits. Ledger1CMS's event-driven architecture handles unlimited traffic spikes without rate limiting your growth.

name: Contentful
comparison_text: Contentful gives you an API. Ledger1CMS gives you an API plus fully rendered front-end components and AI content generation tools.

name: Optimizely
comparison_text: Optimizely feels like unmatched parts glued together. Ledger1CMS is a unified platform where CMS, Analytics, and AI are built as one.

name: WooCommerce
comparison_text: WooCommerce slows down as you grow. Ledger1CMS stays blazingly fast with a serverless database that scales to millions of SKUs.

name: TYPO3
comparison_text: TYPO3 is notoriously hard to learn. Ledger1CMS offers the same robust multi-language support wrapped in an interface your grandmother could use.

name: Contentstack
comparison_text: Contentstack is priced for the Fortune 500. Ledger1CMS democratizes composable architecture for startups and scale-ups.

name: Storyblok
comparison_text: Storyblok's visual editor can be clunky. Ledger1CMS uses a native React canvas for buttery smooth real-time previews and editing.

name: Kentico Xperience
comparison_text: Kentico ties you to .NET. Ledger1CMS is built on standards-based web technologies deployable to Vercel, Netlify, or AWS.

name: Magnolia
comparison_text: Magnolia brings Java enterprise baggage. Ledger1CMS is lightweight, serverless, and ready for the edge.

name: Sanity
comparison_text: Sanity requires learning GROQ. Ledger1CMS works with standard GraphQL and SQL, so you don't need to retrain your team.

name: Liferay
comparison_text: Liferay feels like corporate 2005. Ledger1CMS builds modern, reactive employee experiences that feel like consumer apps.

name: Progress Sitefinity
comparison_text: Sitefinity upgrades are painful projects. Ledger1CMS is SaaS-delivered and always up to date with zero downtime.

name: Ghost
comparison_text: Ghost is great for blogs but fails at apps. Ledger1CMS powers your blog AND your SaaS application from the same content core.
